chat.welcomeDescription: EnterViu AI helps you optimize your CV, create professional content and prepare for interviews. AI assistant supports CV analysis, provides improvement suggestions and optimizes content to help you stand out to employers.

ceo.name: Luong Nguyen Minh An
ceo.bio: An is the visionary leader and technology expert behind EnterViu AI, combining strategic leadership with deep technical expertise. He drives both the business direction and technological innovation that makes our CV optimization platform a trusted solution for career advancement.
ceo.experience: Experience in AI development, business leadership, and strategic technology management.

cto.name: Pham Van Tuan Hieu
cto.bio: Hieu is the development lead who transforms ideas into reality, building robust and scalable solutions for EnterViu AI. His technical expertise and attention to detail ensure our platform delivers exceptional performance and user experience.
cto.experience: Experience in full-stack development, system design, and software engineering.

designer.name: Do Thi Nguyen Hau
designer.bio: Hau brings creativity and user-centered design to EnterViu AI, crafting intuitive interfaces and seamless user experiences. Her design philosophy focuses on making CV optimization accessible and enjoyable for all users.
designer.experience: Experience in UX/UI design, product design, and user research methodologies.

values.description: We believe in helping people create outstanding CVs and achieve their dream career opportunities.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new AI technologies to improve CV optimization and career guidance.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We are committed to delivering high-quality, professional and impactful CV optimization services.

community.title: Empowerment
community.description: We empower job seekers with AI-driven insights to overcome CV barriers and achieve career success.
